alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 9:45PM CDT until August 15 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 944 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barbour County Public Lake Dam, or 9 miles southeast of Midway, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clayton, Osco, Gaino, Richards Crossroads, White Oak, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Millers Ford, Baker Hill, Clayton Municipal Airport and Mount Andrew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
